items.title: World Class Manufacturing & Going Lean

visible_instructors.title: Parag Dadeech
visible_instructors.name: Parag
visible_instructors.job_title: Advisor & Consultant for diversified Process Industries.

items.headline: The course equips you with practical knowledge on the concepts of World Class Manufacturing (WCM) & LEAN, in 6 lectures.
objectives_summary: This valuable course will equip Learners from different back-grounds (Students, Business Practitioners, Engineers, Manufacturing personnel, Operations personnel) to gain a thorough & practical understanding on the concepts of "world class manufacturing" & "Lean". These business transformation tools are applicable to all facets of business including both manufacturing as well as service sectors. These Tools learned can be deployed in any organization. No prior knowledge is required.
World Class Manufacturing & Lean

objectives_summary: The title of the ASQ certification changed to Certified Manager of Quality/Organizational Excellence to reflect the fact that the role of the quality function is continually evolving.

items.title: Quality Management Systems for Operational Excellence

visible_instructors.title: M.P. Tyagi
visible_instructors.name: M.P.
visible_instructors.job_title: Past Exe-Director. Current Management Consultant & Advisor.

items.headline: Complete course for learning and upgrading skills in Quality Systems with practical examples to become more competitive
objectives_summary: You will understand the basic principles of Quality Management which would give you the ability to achieve operational excellence, increase the efficiency and effectiveness of your processes.
You will understand the various perceptions and expectations from which Quality is viewed and the role it plays in building and improving customer satisfaction.
You will understand the methodology and philosophy of Quality control and Quality Assurance and the differences between them.

items.title: 7 Key Steps to Lead Your Team
items.headline: Practical Steps to Lead Your Team Effectively
objectives_summary: Leaders aim to influence others to accomplish a common goal for their team or organization. This workshop will help participants understand the key steps needed to effectively lead their teams.  Participants will learn how to set direction, identify resources, delegate tasks, motivate others, develop the team, provide feedback and recognize the contribution of others. Participants will work through action steps to apply the course material to one of their real life leadership experiences.  The course objectives are as follows:  • Learn how to set direction by developing the team’s vision, mission and goals •	Identify the key people, financial and other resources needed to support the team •	Learn how to delegate tasks and get team members involved  •	Discover  how to inspire and motivate others to want to contribute to the team  •	Explore ways to help grow and develop team members  •	Learn how to provide meaningful and helpful feedback to the team  •	Explore ways to recognize and celebrate the contributions of others

objectives_summary: Achieve extraordinary results in your organization simply by engaging employees.
